name: your-doge
description: An awesome doge themed homework manager.

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd packages/client && yarn dev" "cd packages/shibe && yarn dev"
scripts.dev:on-network: concurrently "cd packages/client && yarn dev:on-network" "cd packages/shibe && yarn dev"
scripts.dev:with-burrito: concurrently "cd packages/client && yarn dev" "cd packages/shibe && yarn dev" "cd packages/burrito && yarn dev"
scripts.dev:electron: concurrently "cd packages/client && yarn dev:electron" "cd packages/shibe && yarn dev"
